CEREC Same-Day Crowns

Get beautiful, durable dental restorations in just one appointment using our advanced CEREC technology.

Same-Day Restorations

Using digital impressioning, we can produce realistic dental restorations – and it only takes one appointment. CEREC is a great way to restore your smile if you have missing or chipped teeth, or unattractive fillings.

What is CEREC Technology?

CEREC (Chairside Economical Restoration of Esthetic Ceramics) is revolutionary dental technology that allows us to design, create, and place custom ceramic restorations in a single visit. Gone are the days of temporary crowns, multiple appointments, and waiting weeks for your restoration.

Traditional Process

  • • Multiple appointments
  • • Temporary crowns
  • • 2-3 week wait time
  • • Messy impressions
  • • Risk of sensitivity

CEREC Process

  • • Single appointment
  • • Permanent restoration same day
  • • No waiting period
  • • Digital impressions
  • • Immediate function

The CEREC Process

1

Digital Scanning

We use a special 3D camera to take precise digital impressions of your tooth. No messy putty impressions needed – the process is comfortable and quick.

2

Custom Design

Our dentist designs your restoration using advanced CAD software, ensuring perfect fit, function, and aesthetics that match your natural teeth.

3

Precision Milling

Your restoration is milled from a high-quality ceramic block in our office using the CEREC milling machine. This process takes about 15-20 minutes.

4

Final Placement

We carefully place and bond your new restoration, making final adjustments to ensure perfect bite and comfort. You leave with a complete, permanent restoration.

Benefits of CEREC Restorations

Time-Saving Convenience

Complete treatment in one appointment saves you time and multiple visits.

Superior Fit

Digital impressions ensure exceptional accuracy and comfort.

Natural Appearance

High-quality ceramics match your natural tooth color and translucency.

Durable Materials

Strong ceramic restorations can last 10-15 years or more with proper care.

Metal-Free

All-ceramic restorations are biocompatible and mercury-free.

No Temporary Crown

Avoid the inconvenience and potential complications of temporary restorations.

Same-Day Smile Restoration

Don't let damaged teeth affect your confidence. With CEREC technology, you can get a beautiful, permanent restoration in just one convenient appointment.

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does a CEREC appointment take?

Most CEREC appointments take 1.5 to 2 hours from start to finish. This includes preparation, scanning, designing, milling, and final placement of your restoration.

Are CEREC restorations as strong as traditional crowns?

Yes! CEREC restorations are made from high-quality ceramic materials that are just as strong and durable as traditional lab-made crowns. They can last 10-15 years or more with proper care.

Is CEREC more expensive than traditional crowns?

While the upfront cost may be similar, CEREC often provides better value because you save time with fewer appointments and avoid the inconvenience of temporary crowns. Many patients find the convenience worth the investment.

What can CEREC be used for?

CEREC can create crowns, inlays, onlays, and veneers. It's ideal for restoring damaged teeth, replacing old fillings, and improving the appearance of chipped or discolored teeth.
